abstract.para: Describes how to run the push messaging-enabled &AMHlong; quickstart app in Android Studio, and send it a push notification using &SNS;.

section.title: Test a Push Messaging-Enabled &AMHlong; App for Android
section.para: This section describes how to test the push messaging-enabled &AMHlong; quickstart app. As a proof of concept, you run the app on an Android virtual device, and then send a push notification from the &SNS; console to the device in two ways: using a direct push, and by publishing to an &SNS; topic.
